ellie brings up insects: Ellie brings up insects of any kind during the stream
ellie rejects evil's idea: Ellie outright rejects an idea Evil has. Modifying an idea does not count as rejecting
ellie sorry over interrupting evil: Ellie interrupts Evil and feels bad about it (either she talks about feeling bad or a simple "sorry")
ellie gets flustered: Ellie gets flustered at any point during the stream
ellie rambles/rants about tech: Ellie either rambles on or rants about tech of any kind
ellie suggests dangerous weaponry: Ellie herself suggests dangerous weaponry to add to the robot body
